```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Define functions
prox_analysis <- function() {}
basal_area_sum <- function(data, distance) {
  data %>% 
    filter(Distance_m <= distance) %>% 
    group_by(Collar) %>% 
    summarise(n_trees = n(), BA_m2 = round(sum(BA_sqm, na.rm = TRUE), digits = 3), dist = distance)
}
```
